text: Anyone do some customizing of the HubSpot Scheduler? <https://www.HubSpot.com/products/sales/schedule-meeting>

I'd really like to route to different people. I have a few ideas in my head.  Have my three forms on the page, all hidden, and have my qualifier in another visible form, causing the right form to display based upon my qualifying question.  Wasn't sure if there was any api access or any Javscript/jquery pieces we could utilize to customize it.
